    • Uses of PolarVector in at.htl.geometrics

      Methods in at.htl.geometrics that return PolarVector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolarVector Line.getPolarVektor()
      Returns the vector in polar form that represents the line.
      PolarVector CartesianVector.toPolarVector()
      Converts the cartesian form into a vector of polar form with magnitude z and angle φ.
